argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | unitdvcl.o | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 2 |  | unitdvcl.d | |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | dvrid.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 | 4, 1 | #P_unitcl | |- ( X e. U -> X e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> X e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` R ) = ( .r ` R ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invr ` R ) = ( invr ` R ) |
| 9 | 4, 7, 1, 8, 2 | #P_dvrval | |- ( ( X e. ( Base ` R ) /\ X e. U ) -> ( X ./ X ) = ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_sylancom | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> ( X ./ X ) = ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 8, 7, 3 | #P_unitrinv | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` X ) ) = .1. ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> ( X ./ X ) = .1. ) |
